          <title>
            <string language="en">Amber as jewellery</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bernstein als Schmucksachen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ambre comme bijoux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Âmbar como a jóia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ambra come monili</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλέκτρινος ως κοσμήματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ámbar como joyería</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that the ancient Greeks used to make jewellery from amber.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">amber</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Charge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Greeks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Jewellery</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">static electricity</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß der alte Grieche 
pflegte, Schmucksachen vom Bernstein zu bilden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que les Grecs antiques 
avaient l'habitude de faire des bijoux à partir de l'ambre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que os gregos antigos se
usaram fazer a jóia do âmbar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che i Greci antichi 
hanno usato fare i monili da ambra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι οι αρχαίοι Έλληνες 
χρησιμοποίησαν για να κάνουν τα κοσμήματα από ηλέκτρινο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que los Griegos antiguos 
hacían la joyería del ámbar.</string>
          </description>
